abstract: The move was the latest in a string of downgrades issued this week on European countries and banks. On Thursday, agencies lowered the ratings of Portugal and Hungary to junk.
snippet: The move was the latest in a string of downgrades issued this week on European countries and banks. On Thursday, agencies lowered the ratings of Portugal and Hungary to junk.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Standard & Poor’s lowered its rating on Belgium’s sovereign debt on Friday, the latest in a string of downgrades issued this week on European countries and banks that have been hit by the European debt crisis.

headline.main: S.&P. Cuts Belgium’s Rating to AA
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Cuts Belgium’s Rating to AA

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
